root.name: Axel & Pixel
root.description: OverviewAxel and Pixel combines point-and-click adventure with platforming, puzzle mini-games, and quick time events. The game's unique visual style can be attributed to the mix of photographs and hand-drawn art used to create the world.The game was developed by Silver Wish Games, a small team based in the Czech Republic.
